Title: CSRF token fixation attacks
Description: Devise has been reported to be vulnerable to CSRF token fixation attacks. The attack can only be exploited if the attacker can set the target session, either by subdomain cookies or by fixation over the same Wi-Fi network. If the user knows the CSRF token, cross-site forgery requests can be made.
AffectedVersions: All versions starting from 2.0.0 before 2.2.5, all versions starting from 3.0.0 before 3.0.1
